name: Duo's Basics in Education of Foreign Languages
name_original: Duo's Basics in Education of Foreign Languages
description:
This is a mod for Baldi's Basics

It's your first day at Duolingo Public School. Your job is to collect 7 notebooks and leave the school immediantly. You will have to search across the entire school to find and collect all the notebooks, and watch out for Duo! He loves to teach foreign languages!! Think you're up for the challenge?
